name: The Alchemist (itch) (DrManticore, knightleaf)
description:
Combination

A series of mysterious doors stand between our Alchemist friend and his destination. Help him find the right combination of objects to open each one to reach something special.

Entry for Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022
  • Knightleaf - Art, Animation, Code, Audio
  • Manti - Code, Music, Audio
Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - pickup/throw objects
  • Esc - pause
